description: Flutter widget implementing a call screen UI with call controls, participant management, and WebRTC video views.

classes.name: CallScreen
classes.description: A Flutter widget representing the call screen with UI for ongoing video call and controls.

classes.name: _CallScreenState
classes.description: State class for CallScreen managing call initiation, termination, and UI interactions.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Initializes call and history entry once dependencies change.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Handles cleanup when widget is disposed.

methods.name: _endCall
methods.description: Ends the call, updates history, and navigates away.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the call screen UI including video views and control buttons.
